$
Happy Birthday to YOU!
​
We're SO flocking happy YOU were born! We're gifting YOU a complimentary shoutout on our Marquee Sign with a Dessert & Sparkler presentation!
*must present our team with a valid ID within 6 days of birthday.
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Weekend Brunch
Saturday
& Sunday | 11:30am
-3pm
Brunch with us EVERY Saturday & Sunday! Grab your brunch baes for delish sweet & savory brunch classics
*
NO RESERVATIONS NEEDED!
/$
$
BRUNCH MENU
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
Rooftop Deck
$
$
/$
$
$
Rooftop Deck – Now Open!
​
Our venue is so amazing we had to shout it from the ROOFTOP! Literally. Our gorgeous Rooftop Deck is OPEN with some heaters & wind screens
(rooftop availability is weather permitting)
.
Stop in for tropical cocktails, tasty food, live music, weekend brunches & more!
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Book Your Next Special Event!
The BEST venue for ANY occasion
Celebrate in STYLE! Holiday, Birthday, Corporate & more – no matter the occasion, we'll help you throw a bash you won't forget. Contact our event planners to starting planning your next event!
/$
$
PLAN YOUR EVENT
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Gift Cards
Available Online & In Venue
​
Give the gift (or treat yourself!) to a FLAMAZING time at THRōW Social. Purchase Gift Cards online & we'll deliver it straight to your inbox OR purchase onsite for a free beautiful envelope & ribbon!
/$
$
GIFT CARDS
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
PromoGC
/$
$
$
$
$
WHAT PEOPLE SAY
/$
$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
Rodger B.
/$
$
What's not to love! A beautiful open space with so many games and attractions. Fun staff, talented bartenders & groovy tunes all night long from live bands and popping DJs. From tasty bites to ping pong, you'll find all the fun you need at Throw Social DC.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
Betty D.
/$
$
This place is a must visit! They have jumbo games! The employees love to laugh with you, which makes the place more inviting. Drinks are on time & they are happy to serve you!
I've been here 4 times & will come back again!
I've recommended this place to many people.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
Jen D.
/$
$
Planning our office event was a breeze. Ana put together a fantastic menu (we have a lot of dietary & catering restrictions) & our people loved everything. They loved the LED game! The THRōW Social DC staff is excellent. The space is huge, and the food is amazing.
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
Share the love, leave us review!
/$

$
/$
$
/$

Showgirl
Davis
$
$
/$
$
$
$
Davis Cup Weekend Party!
Sept 12th & 13th | All Day
​
​
Welcome US Davis Cup Team! Did you know... THRōW Social is just STEPS away from the Delray Beach Tennis Center... only a 7min walk! Join us all weekend for LIVE Music, Cocktails, Good Vibes & more!
/$
$
DETAILS
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Taylor Swift: 'Life of a Showgirl' Album Celebration
Oct 2nd | 7pm-12am
​
​
Celebrate Taylor Swift’s brand-new album ✨ The Life Of A Showgirl ✨ with themed Decor, Drinks, Photo-ops, LIVE Music, Costume Contests & more glitz, glamour &
orange
glitter! Learn more & secure your spot while tickets last.
/$
$
TICKETS
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
Flocktoberfest
Halloween
$
$
$
$
FLOCK-toberfest 2025
Oct 4th | 12pm-close
​
​
Raise your glass for our annual FLOCK-toberfest! Dress in your best
lederhosen outfit
& celebrate with Brats, Beer specials, an epic Stein-holding Contest, authentic German LIVE music & more fun!
All ages welcome.
/$
$
DETAILS
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Halloween Parties
& Costume Contests
Oct 25th & Oct 31st
​
​
SoFlo's BIGGEST Annual Halloween Party just got bigger & better! Join us for TWO Costume Contests with $1500 in cash prizes each night + LIVE music, spooky drink specials _ more Halloween vibes!
/$
$
DETAILS
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
Brunch
R&B
$
$
/$
$
$
$
Ladies ❤️ R&B Beats
&
Brunch
featuring DJ Michael London
Every Sunday | 12pm-4pm
​
​
Beats are smooth, mimosas are bottomless –
every
Sunday
! DJ Michael London is spinning R&B hits, trendy mixes & throwbacks while you soak up the sunshine & brunch vibes! No reservations required.
/$
$
DETAILS
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Weekend Brunch & M
imosas
Saturday-Sunday
| 11am
-3pm
​
Brunch with us EVERY Saturday & Sunday! Grab your brunch baes for delish sweet & savory brunch classics, bottomless mimosas, LIVE music, games & more!
No reservations needed.
/$
$
BRUNCH MENU
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Happy Hour
Wed - Fri | Open - 7pm
​
​
Work hard, Happy Hour harder!
Swing in for the best Happy Hour specials in South Florida. I
ndulge in tasty specials including Well
Cocktails, Wine by the Glass + more food, wine, beer & seltzers!
/$
$
MENU
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
Happy Birthday to YOU!
​
We're SO flocking happy YOU were born!
Keep calm & celebrate on – at THRōW Social Delray! We're gifting YOU a complimentary shoutout on our Marquee Sign with a Dessert & Sparkler presentation! How? Present our team with a valid ID within 6 days of your bday!
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
PrivateEvents
$
$
/$
$
$
$
Book Your Special
Event
​
Holiday, Birthday, Corporate & more – no matt
er the occasion, we'll help you throw
a bash you w
on't forget. Customize your event with enhancements like s'mores stations, live entertainment, champag
ne & more! Contact our event coordinators!
/$
$
PLAN YOUR EVENT
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
$
$
Gift Cards
​
Give the gift OR treat yourself to a FLAMAZING time. We'll send your gift card straight to your inbox or select a time & date for your gift card to arrive for your loved one! Purchase onsite for a FREE beautiful Petal Envelope & ribbon!
/$
$
DETAILS
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
WHAT PEOPLE SAY
/$
$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
Christine M.
/$
$
It's a fun dancing scene!
We went here for our friend's birthday and had a great time – I would like to go again in the day.
It's a
must-go
spot for that cool Delray Beach vibe.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Brandon B.
/$
$
This whole place is a vibe! There's
plenty of board games, ping pong, darts, etc
. Our server was great. She checked in on us often. The DJ was definitely reading the room & playing something for everybody!
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Allie
/$
$
Throw Social is one of my
favorite places to see live music.
I went here on a brunch date and we had the patron tower – very cool. I love the atmosphere & games.
Highly recommend!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
